name: The Fool
description: Represents new beginnings, spontaneity, and a free spirit embarking on a journey.

name: The Magician
description: Symbolizes skill, power, and the ability to manifest desires through will and action.

name: The High Priestess
description: Embodies intuition, mystery, and the subconscious mind's wisdom.

name: The Empress
description: Represents fertility, abundance, and nurturing energy.

name: The Emperor
description: Symbolizes authority, structure, and control.

name: The Hierophant
description: Embodies tradition, spirituality, and conformity to societal norms.

name: The Lovers
description: Represents relationships, love, and meaningful connections.

name: The Chariot
description: Symbolizes determination, victory, and overcoming obstacles through willpower.

name: Strength
description: Embodies courage, patience, and inner strength.

name: The Hermit
description: Represents introspection, solitude, and the search for inner truth.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: Symbolizes change, cycles, and the ebb and flow of life's events.

name: Justice
description: Embodies fairness, truth, and the consequences of actions.

name: The Hanged Man
description: Represents suspension, letting go, and seeing things from a different perspective.

name: Death
description: Symbolizes transformation, endings, and new beginnings through change.

name: Temperance
description: Embodies balance, moderation, and the blending of opposites.

name: The Devil
description: Represents temptation, materialism, and being bound by limitations.

name: The Tower
description: Symbolizes sudden upheaval, revelation, and the breaking down of old structures.

name: The Star
description: Embodies hope, inspiration, and a sense of renewal.

name: The Moon
description: Represents illusion, fear, and the subconscious.

name: The Sun
description: Symbolizes joy, success, and vitality.

name: Judgment
description: Embodies reflection, reckoning, and awakening.

name: The World
description: Represents completion, fulfillment, and the achievement of goals.

name: Ace of Wands
description: Symbolizes new opportunities, creativity, and the spark of inspiration.

name: Two of Wands
description: Represents planning, making decisions, and considering future possibilities.

name: Three of Wands
description: Embodies expansion, growth, and the anticipation of rewards.

name: Four of Wands
description: Symbolizes celebration, harmony, and successful completion of projects.

name: Five of Wands
description: Represents conflict, competition, and challenges that foster growth.

name: Six of Wands
description: Embodies victory, recognition, and public acknowledgment of achievements.

name: Seven of Wands
description: Symbolizes perseverance, defending beliefs, and standing one's ground.

name: Eight of Wands
description: Represents swift action, movement, and the rapid progression of events.

name: Nine of Wands
description: Embodies resilience, persistence, and maintaining boundaries despite challenges.

name: Ten of Wands
description: Symbolizes burden, responsibility, and the weight of obligations.

name: Page of Wands
description: Represents enthusiasm, exploration, and the pursuit of new ideas.

name: Knight of Wands
description: Embodies action, adventure, and a passionate drive towards goals.

name: Queen of Wands
description: Symbolizes confidence, warmth, and the nurturing of creative endeavors.

name: King of Wands
description: Represents leadership, vision, and the ability to inspire others.

name: Ace of Cups
description: Symbolizes emotional fulfillment, new relationships, and spiritual nourishment.

name: Two of Cups
description: Represents partnership, mutual attraction, and harmonious relationships.

name: Three of Cups
description: Embodies celebration, friendship, and community gatherings.

name: Four of Cups
description: Symbolizes contemplation, apathy, and reassessing emotional needs.

name: Five of Cups
description: Represents loss, regret, and focusing on what has gone wrong.

name: Six of Cups
description: Embodies nostalgia, memories, and revisiting the past.

name: Seven of Cups
description: Symbolizes choices, illusions, and the overwhelming of possibilities.

name: Eight of Cups
description: Represents moving on, seeking deeper meaning, and abandoning what no longer serves.

name: Nine of Cups
description: Embodies satisfaction, contentment, and the fulfillment of desires.

name: Ten of Cups
description: Symbolizes happiness, emotional bliss, and harmonious family life.

name: Page of Cups
description: Represents creativity, intuition, and the beginnings of emotional journeys.

name: Knight of Cups
description: Embodies romance, idealism, and the pursuit of emotional connections.

name: Queen of Cups
description: Symbolizes empathy, compassion, and emotional intelligence.

name: King of Cups
description: Represents emotional balance, wisdom, and the mastery of emotions.

name: Ace of Swords
description: Symbolizes clarity, breakthroughs, and the power of intellect.

name: Two of Swords
description: Represents indecision, blocked emotions, and the need to make difficult choices.

name: Three of Swords
description: Embodies heartbreak, sorrow, and emotional pain.

name: Four of Swords
description: Symbolizes rest, recuperation, and taking time to recover.

name: Five of Swords
description: Represents conflict, tension, and the consequences of deceit.

name: Six of Swords
description: Embodies transition, moving forward, and leaving troubles behind.

name: Seven of Swords
description: Symbolizes strategy, cunning, and sometimes deceitful behavior.

name: Eight of Swords
description: Represents restriction, self-imposed limitations, and feeling trapped.

name: Nine of Swords
description: Embodies anxiety, fear, and mental anguish.

name: Ten of Swords
description: Symbolizes endings, betrayal, and the culmination of painful experiences.

name: Page of Swords
description: Represents curiosity, mental agility, and the pursuit of truth.

name: Knight of Swords
description: Embodies action, bravery, and a swift pursuit of goals.

name: Queen of Swords
description: Symbolizes independence, clear communication, and unbiased judgment.

name: King of Swords
description: Represents intellectual authority, strategic thinking, and moral integrity.

name: Ace of Pentacles
description: Symbolizes new financial opportunities, prosperity, and the manifestation of goals.

name: Two of Pentacles
description: Represents balance, adaptability, and juggling multiple responsibilities.

name: Three of Pentacles
description: Embodies teamwork, collaboration, and the pursuit of mastery.

name: Four of Pentacles
description: Symbolizes control, security, and sometimes possessiveness over resources.

name: Five of Pentacles
description: Represents hardship, financial loss, and feeling left out in the cold.

name: Six of Pentacles
description: Embodies generosity, charity, and the balance between giving and receiving.

name: Seven of Pentacles
description: Symbolizes patience, perseverance, and the assessment of progress.

name: Eight of Pentacles
description: Represents diligence, craftsmanship, and the dedication to improving skills.

name: Nine of Pentacles
description: Embodies luxury, self-sufficiency, and the rewards of hard work.

name: Ten of Pentacles
description: Symbolizes wealth, family legacy, and long-term success.

name: Page of Pentacles
description: Represents ambition, curiosity, and the pursuit of new financial ventures.

name: Knight of Pentacles
description: Embodies reliability, hard work, and a methodical approach to tasks.

name: Queen of Pentacles
description: Symbolizes practicality, resourcefulness, and nurturing of financial stability.

name: King of Pentacles
description: Represents financial mastery, abundance, and successful management of resources.
